name: Pre-sql
value:
TRUNCATE TABLE adp_dwh.cdp_stg_dwh.stg_nps_data;
TRUNCATE TABLE adp_dwh.cdp_stg_dwh.stg_nps_questions;

name: Post-sql
value:
copy adp_dwh.cdp_stg_dwh.stg_nps_data FROM 's3://$$S3_Bucket_Name/staging-zone-nps/NPS_Data' IAM_ROLE '$$AWS_IAM_ROLE' maxerror 15 delimiter '|' csv QUOTE '"' IGNOREHEADER 1 ;
copy adp_dwh.cdp_stg_dwh.stg_nps_questions FROM 's3://$$S3_Bucket_Name/staging-zone-nps/NPS_Q' IAM_ROLE '$$AWS_IAM_ROLE' maxerror 15 delimiter '|' csv QUOTE '"' IGNOREHEADER 1 ;

name: Pre-sql
value:
TRUNCATE TABLE adp_dwh.cdp_stg_dwh.stg_nps_data;
TRUNCATE TABLE adp_dwh.cdp_stg_dwh.stg_nps_questions;

name: Post-sql
value:
copy adp_dwh.cdp_stg_dwh.stg_nps_data FROM 's3://$$S3_Bucket_Name/staging-zone-nps/NPS_Data' IAM_ROLE '$$AWS_IAM_ROLE' maxerror 15 delimiter '|' csv QUOTE '"' IGNOREHEADER 1 ;
copy adp_dwh.cdp_stg_dwh.stg_nps_questions FROM 's3://$$S3_Bucket_Name/staging-zone-nps/NPS_Q' IAM_ROLE '$$AWS_IAM_ROLE' maxerror 15 delimiter '|' csv QUOTE '"' IGNOREHEADER 1 ;
